abstract: A campaign by Pepperidge Farm uses ZipList to allow users who click on ads promoting a new line of rolls to add them to an online shopping list.
snippet: A campaign by Pepperidge Farm uses ZipList to allow users who click on ads promoting a new line of rolls to add them to an online shopping list.

headline.main: Pepperidge Farm Rolls, a Click Away
headline.print_headline: Pepperidge Farm Rolls, a Click Away
